Description.Text: Hotel Mancino 12 is an elegant 4-star property offering contemporary accommodation in the heart of Rome. Highlights include free Wi-Fi and an excellent location close to Piazza Venezia. The area surrounding the impressive Trevi Fountain features narrow cobblestone streets and a high concentration of hotels, cafes and restaurants. Nearby places of interest include the Pantheon, the elegant Spanish Steps, the prestigious Via Veneto, the Roman Forum and Quirinal Hill. Colosseo metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Rome destinations. The hotel is housed in a traditional mid-rise building featuring shuttered windows and prominent stonework on the ground floor. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Superior rooms are decorated in a contemporary style with grey tones. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite/cable TV, mini-bar, air-conditioning and complimentary mineral water. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. There are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible nearby.
